basicInfo.productName: Osaka Nankai Line Airport Express/Kansai Airport to Namba Station (One-way/round-trip)

productInfos.productDescription:
Osaka Nankai Line Airport Express: Kansai Airport to Namba Station（Round-Trip Ticket）


[Applicable Range]

Departure: Nankai Kansai Airport Station to Nankai Namba Station/Shin-Imamiya Station/Tengachaya Station (you can get off at any station)

Return: Nankai Namba Station/Shin-Imamiya Station/engachaya Station to Nankai Kansai Airport Station (you can get on at any station)

Time: Any day within 14 days from the start of the journey

※ Departure and return can be on different days.

[Redemption Locations]

Departure: Nankai Kansai Airport Station ticket counter (dedicated counter for redemption)

Return: Nankai Namba Station 2nd floor comprehensive service center, 3rd floor ticket counter,

Shin-Imamiya Station (4th floor), Nankai Tengachaya Station


The round-trip ticket also includes shopping coupons (3 vouchers with a 500 JPY discount each) that can be used at Namba PARKS and Namba CITY.

※ The shopping coupons need to be exchanged at the information center of Namba PARKS or Namba CITY. One coupon can be used for a single purchase over 5,000 JPY including tax at one store. Multiple coupons cannot be used together.


Osaka Nankai Line Airport Express: Kansai Airport to Namba Station (One Way Ticket)


[Applicable Range]

Can be used in any valid section below:

① Nankai Kansai Airport Station to Nankai Namba Station or Shin-Imamiya Station or Tengachaya Station

② Nankai Namba Station or Shin-Imamiya Station or Tengachaya Station to Nankai Kansai Airport Station

[Redemption Locations]

Nankai Kansai Airport Station ticket counter (dedicated counter for redemption)

Nankai Namba Station 2nd floor comprehensive service center, 3rd floor ticket counter, Shin-Imamiya Station (4th floor), Nankai Tengachaya Station

[Important Notes]

If the redemption voucher is forgotten, the ticket cannot be redeemed.

All tickets reserved on the voucher need to be redeemed; partial redemption is not allowed.

Printing only the QR code will not allow redemption. It must be printed together with the important notes.

If the express train is fully occupied, it may not be possible to board the specified train. Thank you for your understanding.

contents.value: Once this product is successfully booked, it cannot be changed or cancelled
Valid for 365 days from the booking date, Valid for 1 use(s) only

E-Ticket, Instant Confirmation
Available from Today

One Way: Limited Express rapi:t Kansai Airport to Namba One Way Ticket     
Round Trip: Limited Express rapi:t Kansai Airport to Namba Round Trip Ticket and Shopping Coupons at Namba PARK or Namba CITY (Three ¥500 Coupons)
All personal expenses and expenses not mentioned in the inclusions

All times are given in local time.
Tickets must be exchanges for a rapi:t reserved seat tickets before boarding with the QR code. 
Round-trip ticket (NART) : Exchange your return voucher within 14 days from the redemption of the departure ticket.
Valid Zone: From Nankai Kansai-Airport to Nankai Namba Station/Nankai Shin-imamiya Station/Nankai Tengachaya Station or return
Redemption Location: Nankai Kansai-Airport Station Ticket Office; Nankai Namba Station 2F Service Center; Nankai Namba Station 3F Ticket Office; Nankai Shin-imamiya Station; Nankai Tengachaya Station
